metadata.title: CVE-2021-31872 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - low.
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in klibc before 2.0.9. Multiple possible integer overflows in the cpio command on 32-bit systems may result in a buffer overflow or other security impact.

notes.note: mdeslaur> only used in initramfs, doesn't parse untrusted data

criterions.comment: klibc package in hirsute is affected and may need fixing.
